name: Bitcoin Hackerspace Network (BTCHackNet) - hackerspace
description: JSON schema of claims about a hackerspace. This credential represents a the membership of a hackerspace to the network and designates whether or not the holder is a self-sovereign issuer.

schema.description: Details about the hackerspace that is joining the bitcoin hackerspace network initiative as a member organization and an issuer of member and membership credentials

name.description: Name of the hackerspace joining the network.

website.description: Website of the hackerspace joining the network.

country.description: The country of the issuing hackerspace.

state.description: The state of the issuing hackerspace.

city.description: The city of the issuing hackerspace.
